attributes.action: change the law to fall into line with other EU countries with regard to the payment of interpreter and translation costs to ensure they are borne by the individual concerned when any non-English speaker becomes involved in police, legal, NHS or any other type of official proceedings in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Nowhere else in the world are people who cannot speak the local language provided with interpretation and translation services free of charge.  The taxpayers of this country should not be required to pay for non-English speakers to be provided with interpretors; translators NOR translations of official documents.
